channel.title: Latest News on Ingrid Arreola | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on Ingrid Arreola | Portfolio

item.title: Iron Quest
item.description: Iron Quest “A monthly community-led data visualization project…participants have a calendar month to source a suitable data set and then design, build, and submit a data visualization. Every viz should aim to showcase best practice & skill in design, storytelling & analysis.

item.title: Iron Quest
item.description: Iron Quest “A monthly community-led data visualization project…participants have a calendar month to source a suitable data set and then design, build, and submit a data visualization. Every viz should aim to showcase best practice & skill in design, storytelling & analysis.

item.title: Collab & Code: Tableau
item.description: I’m an amateur, a data visualization enthusiast who experiments, loves to learn, and participate in community data viz challenges. In February, I learned about Tableau and really fell in love with this tool.

item.title: Strategy, Lessons, and Gratitude
item.description: Each individual goes through distinct steps, decisions, and strategies to arrive at their desired career. Throughout the past few months I have reflected on the next step of my career, grown my network, and relied on my community.

item.title: My Process for Building Data Visualizations
item.description: Story by Data offers weekly challenges in the area of data. I am excited to find out about the challenges and participated for the first time this week. Story by Data Weekly Challenge: “Describe your process or work-flow for creating data visualizations / dashboards”
